channel.title: Intense Mayhem \ Pk - Spawn - Eco \ Dicing & More
channel.description:
Welcome to Intense Mayhem:
Introduction:
Pking - Spawn - Eco Server.
Forums: http://intensemayhem.x10host.com
Webclient: http://intensemayhem.x10host.com/playnow.php
Download: http://intensemayhem.x10host.com/download.php
Pictures of the Server: http://gyazo.com/77be01c125f6252cb3e5df8699fc261e http://gyazo.com/e317ed2ee360f9c0c0a0bfb006d18c67
Server Information
• 100% UPTIME • Many Players ONLINE • Windows and Mac supported client • DDoS Protection
Some Game Features
• Full Screen: possibly the best field of vision on a 614.
• High Detail
• Many More PVP Maps
• Great Economy
• Staff team: Visual, Blackout, Kush.
• Hacking refund support: if you get hacked, our Administration team will try their hardest to make sure you get those items back.
• Full Spirit Shield effects
• Mage bank is completely made to be active, nearby to make the region active.
• Refreeze timers, Combat System all perfected based on player feedback.
• Completionist Cape
Features - 24.7 Uptime - Vote4Cash - Trading - Webclient - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - x3 token weekend - Active helpful staff - 3 Levels of Donator status - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - 100% working leeches - Runescape like Combat - Working Korasi’s Sword - Multi Barrages - Xp Counter - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. - Working Teleblock - Staff of light Special

@Spaze2 wrote:

Welcome to Intense Mayhem:

Server Information

• 100% UPTIME
• Many Players ONLINE
• Windows and Mac supported client
• DDoS Protection

Some Game Features

• Full Screen: possibly the best field of vision on a 614.

• High Detail

• Many More PVP Maps

• Great Economy

• Staff team: Visual, Blackout, Kush.

• Hacking refund support: if you get hacked, our Administration team will try their hardest to make sure you get those items back.

• Full Spirit Shield effects

• Mage bank is completely made to be active, nearby to make the region active.

• Refreeze timers, Combat System all perfected based on player feedback.

• Completionist Cape

Features

  • 24.7 Uptime
  • Vote4Cash
  • Trading

  • Active helpful staff

  • 100% working leeches

  • Multi Barrages
  • Xp Counter
  • Working weapon specs and effects
  • Working curses prayer book, including turmoil!
  • All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars
  • All Spirit shields working, Even their affects.
